name: Cartastrophe (SirBoy)
description:
**Still WIP, meant to be a mobile game**

You lost your mom in the store. In your despair, you want to cause as much damage as possible.

Control with A and D, boost forward with W, and slam left and right with Q and E. Boosting increases costs lots of energy, but also slightly increases your max speed. Slam into shelves to cause damage and knock food down to collect to keep your energy up. But watch out, your run ends when you run out of energy!
